org.rocket

Interface ServiceGraph


  • public interface ServiceGraph
    A ServiceGraph is used when dealing with Service dependencies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emerge(BiConsumer<Service,Service> fn)
      Bottom-up traversal of the graph.
      default Service fold() 
      ServiceGraph get(ServicePath path)
      Find a service by its Class in the graph.
      void rewire(ServicePath path, ServicePath newDep)
      Modify a service's dependency.
      ServiceGraph root()
      Return the root of the graph.
      void sink(BiConsumer<Service,Service> fn)
      Top-down traversal of the graph.

    • Method Detail

        Top-down traversal of the graph.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • emerge

        void emerge(BiConsumer<Service,Service> fn)
        Bottom-up traversal of the graph.
        Parameters:
        fn - non-null consumer
        See Also:

      • root

        ServiceGraph root()
        Return the root of the graph.
        Returns:

      • get

        ServiceGraph get(ServicePath path)
        Find a service by its Class in the graph. Trigger a full traversal of the graph.
        Parameters:
        path - a non-null class
        Returns:
        the sub-graph containing the service

      • rewire

            ServicePath newDep)
        Modify a service's dependency.
        Parameters:
        path - the service to rewire
        newDep - the new dependency
